org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.amp

Class AmpNiReportsFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.output.NiReportsFormatter
      • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.amp.AmpNiReportsFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NiReportDataVisitor<ReportAreaImpl>, NiReportOutputBuilder<ReportAreaImpl>

    public class AmpNiReportsFormatter
extends NiReportsFormatter
    part of the (NiReportsCore, AmpReportsSchema, Reports API) intersection - formats the output according to the AMP-specific rules. Implements translations and GlobalSettings compliance on top of the extensibility offered by NiReportsFormatter

    • Field Summary
